verses.verse: At that time<WH6256> Merodachbaladan<WH4757>, the son<WH1121> of Baladan<WH1081>, king<WH4428> of Babylon<WH894>, sent<WH7971> letters<WH5612> and a present<WH4503> to Hezekiah<WH2396>: for he had heard<WH8085> that he had been sick<WH2470>, and was recovered<WH2388>.

And Hezekiah<WH2396> was glad<WH8055> of them, and shewed<WH7200> them the house<WH1004> of his precious things<WH5238>, the silver<WH3701>, and the gold<WH2091>, and the spices<WH1314>, and the precious<WH2896> ointment<WH8081>, and all the house<WH1004> of his armour<WH3627>, and all that was found<WH4672> in his treasures<WH214>: there was nothing<WH1697> in his house<WH1004>, nor in all his dominion<WH4475>, that Hezekiah<WH2396> shewed<WH7200> them not. precious things: or, spicery armour: or, jewels: Heb. vessels, or, instruments

Then came<WH935> Isaiah<WH3470> the prophet<WH5030> unto king<WH4428> Hezekiah<WH2396>, and said<WH559> unto him, What said<WH559> these men<WH582>? and from whence<WH370> came<WH935> they unto thee? And Hezekiah<WH2396> said<WH559>, They are come<WH935> from a far<WH7350> country<WH776> unto me, even from Babylon<WH894>.

Then said<WH559> he, What have they seen<WH7200> in thine house<WH1004>? And Hezekiah<WH2396> answered<WH559>, All that is in mine house<WH1004> have they seen<WH7200>: there is nothing<WH1697> among my treasures<WH214> that I have not shewed<WH7200> them.
Then said<WH559> Isaiah<WH3470> to Hezekiah<WH2396>, Hear<WH8085> the word<WH1697> of the LORD<WH3068> of hosts<WH6635>:

Behold, the days<WH3117> come<WH935>, that all that is in thine house<WH1004>, and that which thy fathers<WH1> have laid up in store<WH686> until this day<WH3117>, shall be carried<WH5375> to Babylon<WH894>: nothing<WH1697> shall be left<WH3498>, saith<WH559> the LORD<WH3068>.

And of thy sons<WH1121> that shall issue<WH3318> from thee, which thou shalt beget<WH3205>, shall they take away<WH3947>; and they shall be eunuchs<WH5631> in the palace<WH1964> of the king<WH4428> of Babylon<WH894>.

Then said<WH559> Hezekiah<WH2396> to Isaiah<WH3470>, Good<WH2896> is the word<WH1697> of the LORD<WH3068> which thou hast spoken<WH1696>. He said<WH559> moreover, For there shall be peace<WH7965> and truth<WH571> in my days<WH3117>.
